About Me
I am a Full-stack Javascript Developer
I am a Full-stack Javascript developer.
I prefer back-end side (NodeJS with Typescript) but I am familiar with
front-end frameworks such as React or Angular too.
I always strive to write clean and maintainable code. Working in back-
end side allows me to primarily focus on the logical and structural
issues.


our team members

Helped other developers in our team to solve technical problems
